data.name: Dark Home
data.detailed_description:
Dark Home is an asymmetric multiplayer horror game where players must work together with friends or alone enable to escape the nightmare of the Dark Home and the spirit that dwells within it.

All players play in a True First-Person view enable to increase immersion and accuracy.
One player takes the role of the spirit; a ghost that haunts a nightmarish pocket-dimension called the "Dark Home". The goal of the spirit is to find and eradicate the players within the nightmare.
The other (x) amount of players are tasked with finding the dream catchers and igniting them, weakening the nightmare and allowing them to escape. But they must be careful; the spirit is not alone in stopping the player. Trapped souls wander around the nightmare, looking to weaken the player and make them easy for the spirit to pick-off.
Will you escape the nightmare in this EARLY ACCESS title?

Dark Home was made in tandem with the book "Dark Home" by author Sandra Rains DeBusk.

data.short_description: Dark Home is an asymmetric multiplayer horror game where players must work together with friends or alone enable to escape the nightmare of the Dark Home and the spirit that dwells within it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1050 TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 3600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2070 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: This product depicts violence and gore.
